scripts.postinstall-cam-client-app-build: echo --Install publish submodule (posix commands used)-- && sh ./utils/cam-client-app-build-init.sh
scripts.postinstall-venv-init: echo --Install publish submodule (posix commands used)-- && sh ./utils/venv-init.sh
scripts.postinstall-UNUSED: echo --Run postinstall tasks-- && npm-run-all postinstall-cam-client-app-build postinstall-venv-init
scripts.flask: echo --Run python flask server (venv required)-- && cross-env FLASK_APP=src/server.py:app FLASK_ENV=development flask run
scripts.python-tests: echo --Run python tests (unittest, venv required)-- && python -m unittest discover -f -t . -s src -p *_test.py
scripts.python-lint: echo --Run python linter (flake8, venv required)-- && flake8 src
scripts.eslint: echo --Run js linter (eslint)-- && npx eslint static/js/**.js
scripts.lint: echo --Run all linters-- && npm-run-all python-lint eslint
scripts.help: echo --List all available script commands-- && npm-package-user-scripts-list
